overview:
Doron Simovitch co-founded SortPrice.com in March 2004 and has served as President and Chief Executive Officer since its inception.

As CEO, Doron drives overall direction and business strategies, while overseeing all growth and day-to-day operations for SortPrice.com.

Under his direction, SortPrice.com has consistently led the industry in innovation and user experience, making the company one of the fastest growing online shopping comparison sites today.

Doron has more than 10 years experience in managing technology and e-commerce.

Doron has been quoted as an industry expert on major technology and retail issues in Crainâ€™s, the Dallas Morning News, the Roanoke (VA) Times, and Internetnews.com and has appeared on CNN Radio. He periodically addresses technology and e-commerce issues on his personal blog as well.
